Title: Provides final discipline authority over civilian complaints to the civilian complaint review board
Summary: Provides final discipline authority over civilian complaints to the civilian complaint review board; creates a hearing officer and adjudicative body for such complaint review board.
LawCode: Amd §§434 & 440, NYC Chart; amd §14-115, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing final discipline authority over civilian complaints to the civilian complaint review board
